resources.name: background-jobs
resources.description: Configure background jobs for scheduled and recurring tasks with Rystem.BackgroundJob - supports cron expressions, async operations, and dependency injection

resources.name: concurrency
resources.description: Implement distributed locks and prevent race conditions with Rystem.Concurrency - supports locks, semaphores, and Redis-based distributed coordination

resources.name: content-repo
resources.description: Upload, download, and manage files with Rystem.Content - unified interface for Azure Blob Storage, File System, and SharePoint
